int sum = 0;  
int endNum = 3;  
  
for (int i = 1; i <= endNum; i++) {  
    sum = sum + i;  
    System.out.println("i= " + i + " sum=" + sum);  
}

//i= 1 sum=1
//i= 2 sum=3
//i= 3 sum=6

int count = 0;

while (count < 3) {  
    count = ++count;  
    System.out.println("í˜„ì¬ ìˆ«ìëŠ”: " + count);  
}
// í˜„ì¬ ìˆ«ìëŠ”: 1
// í˜„ì¬ ìˆ«ìëŠ”: 2
// í˜„ì¬ ìˆ«ìëŠ”: 3
